title: Layer 9.1: Conflict Detection - Implementation (GREEN)
description: Implement conflict detection: detectConflict(localDoc, remoteDoc, lastSyncTimestamp) -> ConflictContext | null. Track document versions, compare update timestamps, identify which fields conflict.

title: Layer 9.1: Conflict Detection - Tests (RED)
description: Write failing tests for conflict detection. Tests should: 1) Detect concurrent modifications to same document, 2) Detect client change during server sync, 3) Compare timestamps/versions, 4) Identify conflicting fields. Create ConflictContext type with localDoc, remoteDoc, conflictingFields.

title: Layer 10.5: Offline Replay - Implementation (GREEN)
description: Implement replay mechanism: On 'online' event, replay queue sequentially. Track success/failure per mutation. Emit 'replayProgress', 'replayComplete', 'replayFailed' events.

title: ChangeEventRouter Split - Tests (RED)
description: Write tests for extracted ChangeEventRouter components. Current class handles: event routing, middleware pipeline, priority queue, batching, metrics. Write tests for: EventTransformer, MiddlewarePipeline, PriorityQueue, BatchProcessor, MetricsCollector as separate classes.

title: Layer 10.1: Network Status Detection - Cleanup (REFACTOR)
description: Add custom connectivity check callback, configurable debounce interval, handle edge cases (captive portals, limited connectivity).

title: Layer 10.5: Offline Replay - Tests (RED)
description: Write failing tests for offline replay. Tests should: 1) Replay queued mutations on reconnect, 2) Respect mutation order, 3) Handle partial success (some mutations fail), 4) Retry failed mutations.

title: Extract Storage Access Pattern - Tests (RED)
description: Write tests for extracted storage access. Currently repeated pattern in credential-storage.ts: check backend type, get from memory or storage. Tests should verify unified access.

title: Layer 9.5: Version Vector Strategy - Cleanup (REFACTOR)
description: Optimize version vector storage, implement vector pruning for inactive clients, add visualization for debugging.

title: Reconnection Jitter - Cleanup (REFACTOR)
description: Refactor reconnection strategy: Extract to configurable BackoffStrategy interface, support different algorithms (exponential, linear, fibonacci), configurable jitter range.

title: Layer 10.1: Network Status Detection - Implementation (GREEN)
description: Implement NetworkMonitor class: Subscribe to window online/offline events (browser), implement socket ping (Node.js), emit 'online'/'offline' events, expose isOnline() method.

title: Layer 10.6: Replay Failure Handling - Implementation (GREEN)
description: Implement failure handling: Move to dead letter queue after maxRetries, expose getFailedMutations(), retryFailed(mutationId), discardFailed(mutationId). Emit 'mutationFailed' event.

title: JWT Base64URL Decoding - Cleanup (REFACTOR)
description: Refactor JWT decoding: Extract to utility function, add comprehensive error handling, consider using a well-tested JWT library if available.

description: Update generic constraints from { _id?: string } to { _id: string }. Update all mutation handlers, transform types, and related interfaces. Ensure backward compatibility or document breaking change.

Reconnection Race Condition - Implementation (GREEN)

title: JWT Base64URL Decoding - Tests (RED)
description: Write failing tests for JWT Base64URL decoding. Current implementation uses atob() which doesn't handle URL-safe Base64 (- instead of +, _ instead of /). Tests should cover: 1) Standard Base64 JWT payload, 2) Base64URL with - and _ characters, 3) Payloads requiring padding restoration, 4) Malformed JWT handling. Location: bearer-token.ts:868-881

title: Field Path Sanitization - Tests (RED)
description: Write failing tests for field path sanitization in predicate compiler. Tests should reject: 1) Paths starting with $ (e.g., $where), 2) Paths containing __proto__, 3) Paths containing constructor, 4) Paths with null bytes or control characters. Location: query/predicate-compiler.ts
